meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intrusive.
meanings.sent1: Her intrusiveness in our conversation made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: I don't appreciate the intrusiveness of their questions.
meanings.sent3: His intrusiveness in trying to join our game was amusingly persistent.
meanings.sent4: The intrusiveness of the bright light through the window disrupted my sleep.
meanings.sent5: The intrusiveness of the loud music made it impossible to concentrate.

meanings.definition: The tendency to intrude or impose oneself on others.
meanings.sent1: The neighbor's intrusiveness in our affairs was frustrating.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable with the intrusiveness of his behavior.
meanings.sent3: His intrusiveness in rearranging the furniture was comically unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: The intrusiveness of the cold wind cut through my jacket.
meanings.sent5: The intrusiveness of the salesperson's pitch was overwhelming.
